name: xstocksfun-trading-platform
description: Real trading platform for xStocks tokens on Solana

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && cross-env PORT=3006 pnpm run dev
scripts.build: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pnpm install
scripts.install:all:retry: pnpm install || pnpm install || pnpm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.vite backend/dist
scripts.reset: pnpm run clean && pnpm run install:all:retry

author: xStocksFun
